holy cow that is a beefy question. Gnome/KDE = windowing environments  KDM/GDM/XDM are display mangers (the control the X session start and stop and login) Metacity/Enlightenment/FVWM/Fluxbox are all window managers (the control the look and feel of the windows,task bars, background, etc) GTK is a toolkit to develope Gnome apps as Qt is a toolkit to develope KDE apps and so on
So *DM are all pretty basic, huh?
